Literature.Title: Novel Design of Heptad Amphiphiles To Enhance Cell Selectivity, Salt Resistance, Antibiofilm Properties and Their Membrane-Disruptive Mechanism.
Literature.Author: Dou X, Zhu X, Wang J, Dong N, Shan A

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>128µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=64µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=32µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CICC 10419(MIC=256µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CICC 21625(MIC=64µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CICC 21630(MIC=32µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CICC 11411(MIC=128µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CICC 11421(MIC=256µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CICC 11431(MIC=64µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa 21328(MIC=128µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa 25349(MIC=32-64µg/ml),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(10-20% Cytotoxicity=>256µg/ml)
